name: Garlic Bud
description: Garlic Bud is a classic indica strain from the 90's, bred by The Seed Bank (now known as Sensi Seeds) using Afghani genetics. Its name is only loosely tied to Garlic Bud's aroma, which smells a lot more like tangy musk and spice than anything you'd throw in your stir fry. This pungent-smelling indica expresses a duality of effects: heavy body effects that crush insomnia and pain coupled with an invigorating cerebral buzz. A 7 or 8 week flowering time is all Garlic Bud needs to reach full maturation, finishing with sizeable yields.
descriptionPlain: Garlic Bud is a classic indica strain from the 90's, bred by The Seed Bank (now known as Sensi Seeds) using Afghani genetics. Its name is only loosely tied to Garlic Bud's aroma, which smells a lot more like tangy musk and spice than anything you'd throw in your stir fry. This pungent-smelling indica expresses a duality of effects: heavy body effects that crush insomnia and pain coupled with an invigorating cerebral buzz. A 7 or 8 week flowering time is all Garlic Bud needs to reach full maturation, finishing with sizeable yields.

highlightedReviews.text: I picked up Garlic bud because it was cheap and I was short on money. I was impressed by this bud. Very good, quite stoney, took away my cares. I picked up some Moonrocks at the same time, but actually preferred the effects of the Garlic bud.
This strain has an amazing and unique smell. I would highly recommend it for the true connoisseur.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Blue Heron, Haze Heaven, Grimace, Garlic Bud, and Nurse Jackie
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
New strains are here, and many more are on the way! Using the Leafly app, it's now possible to nominate strains for inclusion in the Explorer. Simply enter the strain into the search bar on the "Explore Strains" page, and if no results surface, you'll be given the option to submit this variety. Keep in mind that we won't be able to tend to all requests, but we'll do what we can to make it happen as long as we can still eat, sleep, and go home every once in while.
   1. Blue Heron
Characteristics of Blue Heron:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Magoo and Huckleberry
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Blueberry, rose, and citrus aroma
Flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Haze Heaven
Characteristics of Haze Heaven:

60/40 indica-domintant hybrid
Cross between Northern Lights #5, Haze, Afghani, and Hawaiian
Breeder: Soma Seeds
Musky, spicy aroma
Buzzing cerebral energy paired with mellow, relaxing body effects
Flowering time of 10 to 11 weeks

   3. Grimace
Characteristics of Grimace: 

Mostly indica strain
Unknown genetics
Sedating, mellow effects
Grows into large, conic, purple buds (that may or may not look just like this off-putting fast-food mascot)

   4. Garlic Bud
Characteristics of Garlic Bud:

Mostly indica strain
Bred using Afghani genetics
Breeder: The Seed Bank (now Sensi Seeds)
Pungent spicy, musky aroma
Relaxing body effects coupled with an invigorating cerebral buzz
Flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   5. Nurse Jackie
Characteristics of Nurse Jackie:

85/15 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Jack the Ripper and Medicine Woman
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sour citrus aroma
Clear-headed, functional buzz
